temples.history: The Arequipa Temple was dedicated in four sessions on December 15, 2019, by Ulisses Soares, a member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles. It is located in the Cayma district north of the city of Arequipa, Peru.
temples.ordinance: All ordinances are available by appointment only
